Class CabBookDistanceBased

  • java.lang.Object
    • Project.CabBook
      • Project.CabBookDistanceBased

  • public class CabBookDistanceBased
extends CabBook
    This class implements distance based cab booking system. User details are written into objects of this class and are serialized and written to Distance.db
    Author:
    nisarg
